short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xooma Intelligence Network Builder quickly finds the top influencers and top influential posts in any FB group.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Xi Network Builder quickly and easily discovers the top influencers and top influential posts in any FB group.

It is imperative to interact with the most engaged posts, and this extension takes all the guesswork and scrolling time out of the equation.

You will be able to quickly and easily gather and analyze data from FB Group posts, so you can see:

- Which are the top performing posts
- Who are the primary influencers within the group

This data will allow you to know which posts to focus your time on interacting with, and which people in the group will be most advantageous to network with. 

You will get a page of the top posts, and a page of the top influencers.

You can also download the data as a .CSV file should you choose to do so (this is optional).

This extension is an authorized white label version of the "Gru Flu" extension by Tier5.

If you are looking to increase you productivity when interacting with Groups, this extension is a must-have addition to your repertoire.
